title: Creek County woman fatally shoots 6-year-old son, kills self, authorities say
content:
Related story: OSBI assists with death investigation in Creek County; more info to be released Wednesday
A woman shot and killed her 6-year-old son before turning the gun on herself at their Creek County home Tuesday afternoon, according to authorities.
Sheriff’s deputies responded to a welfare check at a residence in the 22500 block of West 71st Street, located northwest of Sapulpa, around 3:10 p.m. and found a woman and a boy shot to death.
The Sheriff’s Office identified the two as 32-year-old Jennifer Renee Dickerson and her son, Jacob Robert Dickerson, in a news release Wednesday.
Family members initially alerted the Sheriff’s Office after they were unable to contact Dickerson when she failed to take her child to school, Sgt. Les Vaughan said in the release.
When deputies arrived at the home, they made their way inside and found the mother and son’s bodies in a bed. Both appeared to have died from single gunshot wounds, Vaughan said, and an initial investigation determined Dickerson shot her son before shooting herself. The motive was unknown, Vaughan said.
The Oklahoma State Bureau of Investigation is assisting the Sheriff’s Office with the case.
Kyle Hinchey
